name: ELE-mental (ProtoMass)
description:
ELE-mental is a frantic sci-fi dungeon crawler where you need to hit the enemy blobs with their corresponding colour (element) to vanquish them, hitting them with the wrong colour causes them to multiple.

As a prototype its set within three sci-fi themed floors shrouded in darkness until you enter each room, as you do the enemies rush towards you, a single touch kills you.

The backdrop maybe sterile and utilitarian but lights, vibrant monsters and bullet glows fill the screen with colour creating an enjoyable experience.

Standard movement controls (WASD) allow you to move your character, the mouse allows you to aim, left click fires and right click switches between the different colours.

Like all ProtoMass games, if this prototype reaches it's target it will be made into a full game, so vote with your wallets if you enjoy ELE-mental.

The target for a full release of ELE-Mental is $8,000, we are very grateful that you have all chosen to pay a total of $1,000 so far towards development!

If ELE-mental is made into a full game it will be expanded in every sense with at least 20 levels, power-ups, puzzles and improved graphics, effects, sounds and music.

We hope you enjoy playing.
